<Dry Tortugas National Park
1:

Text: Dry Tortugas National Park:  The park preserves Fort Jefferson and the seven Dry Tortugas islands, the westernmost and most isolated of the Florida Keys.

Text: Dry Tortugas National Park:  The archipelago's coral reefs are the least disturbed of the Florida Keys reefs.
